walking_ifnuke.shift_2: Your cute pet won't detonate on its own! However, keep in mind it attracts lightning and will explode if struck!
walking_ifnuke.shift_3: Be careful not to hit your pet, or it might get angry!
walking_ifnuke.shift_5: Try giving it a Nether Star while the cover is closed!
walking_ifnuke.normal: One for every home! Everyone's favorite Infinity Nuke!
